title: Stuck at 300ms at every game
body:
This problem happened for over a week now and I can't seem resolve this problem permanently. Every game I get around 300ms and stays there for the hole game. The only way that I found to fix this is to restart the client and reconnect back in. 

I've tried:
- Updating Driver
- Restarting Modem/router
- Malware/Virus Scan
 Is there anyway to fix this problem permanently.

Thanks,
TheMightySausage (OCE)

replies.body: Thanks for taking the time to troubleshoot this!  I'm thinking your ISP might have changed its routing to our servers and causing this delay.  Run a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) which will help determine your routing, and attach it in a[ ticket to our tech team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We can look into this a little deeper and find the best options for you.
